name: 'Ze Odyssey of the Removed Keys
description:
Hi! My name is Joe and I'm a student developer from Indiana, US.

This is my first solo game!

My game is very short. Should only take a couple minutes, however you do need to refresh the page to restart the game.

So Happy to be a part of the GMTK Game Jam. 

My Theme is - A Text-based Adventure, where you can't type?

Check it out! It's a little rough, so I hope you enjoy it.

It was made using Godot v3 and it's my first game with the engine.
